title: Hour 2: Expect the Unexpected
description:
In this episode, Ryan Clark, Channing Crowder, and Domonique Foxworth return to debate if Kyler Murray is under more pressure this season after it was revealed he has mandatory film study in his contract extension. Move over Stephen A.- it's Ryan Clark's list today! He gives us his top 5 quarterbacks with the most to prove this season, but does everyone agree with his choices? The crew tries to expect the unexpected and predict what team they believe will emerge as a sleeper this NFL season. Ryan, Channing, and Domonique discuss just how worried Mike McCarthy should be about his job security as head coach of "America's Team". Plus, Aaron Rodgers in a Con Air sequel...?

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Which NFL team will emerge as a sleeper this season?
